content.theme: Words are weapons. Contacts are armor. The best contractors never need to fight.
content.design: Influence augments enhance social encounters, provide team support, and offer non-combat solutions.

augments.name: Calm Under Fire
augments.effect: +1 to Edge checks during combat (not attacks)

augments.name: Voice Modulator
augments.effect: +2 to Deception and Bluff checks. Voice pitch, tone, and cadence are software-controlled

augments.name: Micro-Expression Reader
augments.effect: +2 to Insight checks and detecting lies. Facial muscle tracking overlay in your HUD

augments.name: Inspiring Presence
augments.effect: 1/combat: one ally rerolls a failed stat check

augments.name: Pheromone Emitter
augments.effect: 1/encounter: target within short range becomes non-hostile for 1 round. Edge vs Grit

augments.name: Empathic Broadcast
augments.effect: 1/combat: all enemies in short range make Edge check DC 7 or hesitate, losing 1 AP on their next turn

augments.name: Network Node
augments.effect: 1/mission: contact a friendly NPC in any district for intel. You always know someone who knows someone

augments.name: Puppet Strings
augments.effect: 1/combat: force one enemy to attack an ally of yours choosing

augments.name: Silver Tongue Protocol
augments.effect: All social checks gain +3. 1/mission: auto-succeed a persuasion check vs a non-boss NPC

augments.name: Kingmaker
augments.effect: 1/mission: auto-succeed one social encounter OR grant all allies +2 to all checks for one combat
